name: Add an Airtable record to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
This template allows you to add an Airtable record to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet as a new row.

Your Airtable table has to contain a field of type "Last modified time" that changes when a specified field (you can name it "To Excel") is updated. See [this Airtable table](https://airtable.com/shr6HG31msah5n9bs) for reference.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers (at least 5 to see the template's default settings).
